title: Moonmote
content:
ction

Illuminate the area around you with wisps of moonish light that make movement difficult for enemies and bolster your allies' damage.

At the start of their turn, each hostile creature within the light must succeed a Wisdom Saving Throw or they must treat the lighted area as Difficult Terrain. Each ally within the light deals an additional 1~4 Radiant damage on a hit with melee attacks.

18m Concentration Long Rest
